item.title: How To Fix ‘Borderlands 4’ Confirmed Console Performance Problems - Forbes
item.description:
1. How To Fix ‘Borderlands 4’ Confirmed Console Performance Problems  Forbes
  2. Borderlands 4 Performance Gets Worse the Longer You Play on Console, Randy Pitchford Suggests Quitting the Game and Restarting as a Workaround  IGN
  3. My sincere apologies to Randy Pitchford, but if Borderlands 4 is struggling on an RTX 5090, you can't tell gamers they need to upgrade their PCs  TechRadar
  4. "Some need to learn how their PCs work" — Borderlands 4 head fires back as optimal settings for 68 GPUs released  Windows Central
  5. Borderlands 4 devs are "doing everything we can" to get out the looter shooter's console patch quickly, but the process is "more involved" than it is on PC  GamesRadar+
